sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓はその↑子供↑↓こども↓を↑押↑↓お↓|し↑入↑↓い↓れ|に↑閉↑↓と↓じ↑込↑↓こ↓めた。
sdata.e: The burglar shut the child in the closet.

sdata.e: In most sports the team that practice hardest usually brings home the bacon.
